#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll unsigned long long int

int main()
{
    unsigned long long  n;
    int t;
    cin>>t;
   unsigned long long int a[]={
    	1ll, 1ll, 2ll, 3ll, 6ll, 10ll, 20ll, 35ll, 70ll, 126ll, 252ll, 462ll, 
		924ll, 1716ll, 3432ll, 6435ll, 12870ll, 24310ll, 48620ll, 92378ll,
	    184756ll, 352716ll, 705432ll, 1352078ll, 2704156ll, 5200300ll, 
		10400600ll, 20058300ll, 40116600ll, 77558760ll, 155117520ll, 
		300540195ll, 601080390ll, 1166803110ll,2333606220ll,4537567650ll,
		9075135300ll,
    17672631900ll,
    35345263800ll,
    68923264410ll,
    137846528820ll,
    269128937220ll,
    538257874440ll,
    1052049481860ll,
    2104098963720ll,
    4116715363800ll,
    8233430727600ll,
    16123801841550ll,
    32247603683100ll,
    63205303218876ll,
    126410606437752ll,
    247959266474052ll,
    495918532948104ll,
    973469712824056ll,
    1946939425648112ll,
    3824345300380220ll,
    7648690600760440ll,
    15033633249770520ll,
    30067266499541040ll,
    59132290782430712ll,
    118264581564861424ll,
    232714176627630544ll,
    465428353255261088ll,
    916312070471295267ll,
    1832624140942590534ll
    };
   while(t--) {
      cin>>n;
     cout<<lower_bound(a,a+65,n)-a<<endl;
    }
}
